Param.Description: User Name

Keyword.Name: MasterDataUploadVendor
Keyword.Description: Master Data Upload Vendor (Images\AdminDev\Customer_Management\MasterDataUploadVendor.png)

Param.Name: sCustomerName
Param.Description: Customer Name need to configure

Param.Name: sVendorFormat
Param.Description: Vendor Master Data File Format

Param.Name: sFilePath
Param.Description: Path to vendor file need to upload

Param.Name: sFilePath2
Param.Description: In some case we can upload 2 files. put this null if ignore, If you put value in here, please help make sure that flow support import 2 input files

Param.Name: sExpectedResult
Param.Description: Expected of Upload Result

Param.Name: sExpectedMessage
Param.Description: Expected of Upload Message, correct format: Expected_Address_Message;Expected_Vendor_Message

Param.Name: sIsCancel
Param.Description: After Import if you want to click on Cancel button then set it true

Param.Name: sIsStartOver
Param.Description: After Import if you want to click on Start Over button then set it true

Keyword.Name: ExecuteSQLQueries

Param.Description: List of sql queries2 need to execute - separate each with "|"

Param.Name: sExpectedResults
Param.Description: List of expected string need to verify - separate with "|"

Param.Name: sUnExpectedResults
Param.Description: List of unexpected string need to verify - separate with "|"

Param.Name: sOptional
Param.Description: ExecuteSQLFile(SQLFilePath) means by pass all SQL Queries above and execute the sql file

Keyword.Name: ExecuteSQLQueries
Keyword.Description: use sqlcmd to connect database on sql server, then execute multiple sql queries and check response

Param.Name: sConnectString
Param.Description: provide 5 params: hostname - port - user - pass - database name need to connect - separate each with "|"

Param.Name: sSQLqueries1
Param.Description: List of sql queries1 need to execute - separate each with "|"

Param.Name: sSQLqueries2
Param.Description: List of sql queries2 need to execute - separate each with "|"

Param.Name: sSQLqueries3
Param.Description: List of sql queries3 need to execute - separate each with "|"

Param.Name: sExpectedResults
Param.Description: List of expected string need to verify - separate with "|"

Param.Name: sUnExpectedResults
Param.Description: List of unexpected string need to verify - separate with "|"

Param.Name: sOptional
Param.Description: ExecuteSQLFile(SQLFilePath) means by pass all SQL Queries above and execute the sql file

Keyword.Name: SearchInPaymentPage
Keyword.Description: Search in payment page in Pending Tab - This keyword should use after keyword FilterInPaymentPage (Images\Customer\Payment\16.png)

Param.Name: sViewType
Param.Description: Select ViewType, null means by pass select it, let it default (Pending Payments)

Param.Name: sFieldName
Param.Description: Field Name, null means not filter

Param.Name: sOperator
Param.Description: Operator need to compare

Param.Name: sValue
Param.Description: Value need to input on Input Value

Param.Name: sValue2
Param.Description: Value 2, this field will display when user select Operator = Range

Param.Name: sTimeToSearch
Param.Description: Time after click Search button - in case search action take a lot of time

Param.Name: sExpectedResultCount
Param.Description: Number of result - It | 0: not found | 1: found 1 result | null: not check - by pass this parameter - use in case add multiple search

Param.Name: sOptional
Param.Description: DoNotExtend(true) mean after search, no extend Bank, File to reduce running time, OpenFirstPayment(true) means after search, it will open first payment for viewing Payment Detail
